com.alvermont.terraj.util.ui
Class HiddenTableModel

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
      com.alvermont.terraj.util.ui.HiddenTableModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.table.TableModel
Direct Known Subclasses:
CameraTableModel
public class HiddenTableModel
extends javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
implements javax.swing.table.TableModel

A table model that can show or hide selected columns of the data. Modified and extended from the original version by Vincent Oberle available at: http://www.codeguru.com/java/articles/660.shtml This version supports more operations.

Version:
$Id: HiddenTableModel.java,v 1.6 2006/07/06 06:58:34 martin Exp $
Author:
martin
See Also:

moveRow

public void moveRow(int from,
                    int to)
Move a row from one index to another in the table. No rows data is affected but other rows than the ones specified can change position as a result of the move.

Parameters:
from - The index of the row in its original position
to - The index of the row in its new position
